Record Class BorderAroundText.HeavySides

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record

Enclosing interface:

public static record BorderAroundText.HeavySides(String boxFormat, String boxBorder) extends Record implements BorderAroundText
The border with heavy left and right sides.
